description:
Whitebeard shrugs off his injuries and leads a ferocious charge into the heart of the enemy`s defenses, but three deadly Admirals join forces to silence his shock wave attack as the pirates find themselves surrounded by impenetrable walls!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le mur d`encerclement se dresse ! Les pirates de Barbe Blanche acculés !
The Encircling Walls Activated! The Whitebeard Pirates Backed into a Corner!
В стальном кольце! Пираты Белоуса в критическом положении!
包囲壁作動! 白ひげ海賊団絶体絶命!!
